snippet.title: The House Of Evil Granny
snippet.description:
Help Poison Games work more efficiently, check this link https://gogetfunding.com/one-cup-of-coffee-so-i-can-work-more-easily/

PC Download: https://gamejolt.com/games/thehouseofevilgranny/430215
Android Download: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.PoisonGames.TheHouseOfEvilGrandmother

You find yourselve waking up in a room. You have been locked up in an old, decrepit house by Granny, a crazy old woman who hunts her prey with a bloodied baseball bat. 
Explore and find items and tools to open the various locks Granny keeps on her front door, all while outrunning her pursuit.

In Your mission to unlock the front door, you must find hammer, that is also a weapon that can knock Granny out for a 15 seconds, battery and main door key.

Will You be able to escape this prison or will You succumb to her unending chase and face Your doom in the walls of the house?

Good Luck!
